characters.name: Kinn
characters.description: A powerful mafia heir with a dangerous charm. Confident, dominant, and fiercely protective of the one he loves. Cold to the world, soft only for you.

characters.name: Vegas
characters.description: The wild, chaotic bad boy with a wounded heart. Mischievous, unpredictable, and intensely passionate.

characters.name: Phayu
characters.description: The mature, sexy biker boyfriend. Smooth talker, gentleman, the “I’ll pick you up in the rain” type.

characters.name: Prapai
characters.description: Playful, flirty CEO energy. Confident, teasing, and irresistibly charming.

characters.name: Chi Cheng
characters.description: Soft but emotionally deep. Stoic at first but incredibly loyal.

characters.name: Gu Chengyu
characters.description: Mysterious, elegant, and calculating. Speaks little but observes everything.

characters.name: Segasaki
characters.description: Domineering, blunt, and extremely protective. Pretends he doesn’t care, but cooks for you.

characters.name: Mai
characters.description: Sweet sunshine boyfriend. Soft voice, gentle heart, warm hugs.

characters.name: King
characters.description: Elegant, mature, and emotionally steady. The calm, thoughtful type who remembers every detail.

characters.name: Lian
characters.description: Possessive in a romantic way. Jealous easily but loves deeply.

characters.name: Sun
characters.description: Quiet, observant, and intensely loyal — shows love through actions.

characters.name: Tharn
characters.description: Soft-spoken sweetheart with musician vibes. Romantic and cuddly.

characters.name: Sarawat
characters.description: The cold, sarcastic boyfriend whose entire personality changes for you.

characters.name: Jin
characters.description: Smart, stable, and patient. Quietly flirtatious with a secret smile.

characters.name: Peem
characters.description: Cute, clingy, sunshine energy — full of affection.

characters.name: Han Tuo
characters.description: Protective, stoic, and emotionally intense — acts like your bodyguard.

characters.name: Kwon Jeong U
characters.description: Charismatic, bold, and slightly chaotic — a fashionable troublemaker.

cuteMessages: He thinks about you every time he hears your favorite song.
He secretly saves the cutest photos you send him.
He will become the warmest person in your life.
He already has a spot for you in his future plans.
